titles.title: American Oil for American Families Act of 2012
A bill to ban the exportation of crude oil produced on Federal land, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 3/20/2012--Introduced. American Oil for American Families Act of 2012 - Bans the export from the United States of petroleum extracted from public lands in the United States (including lands located on the outer Continental Shelf [OCS]), or a petroleum product produced from such petroleum.
